ygData.subject: Re: Re: Re: Gargoyle Island in Ocean of Tears
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey all, Here on the Nameless you can almost make a living (at the low end) off of the Spider Silks... I ve gotten 30-36 pp per Swatch!? (15-20pp per silk,
ygData.messageBody:
Hey all,

Here on the Nameless you can almost make a living (at the low end) off of the Spider Silks... I've gotten 30-36 pp per Swatch!? (15-20pp per silk, 300-400 per stack) The inflation was over the past 2-3 weeks. I can see it coming down a little as the bazaar fills with silk now.

Another place is to farm the tribal gatherers in Dawnshroud Peaks for their Blocks, Small Bricks and Large Bricks of Acrylia for bazaar and sell weapons to the merchants (1-5pp ea).

Ciao,
Miracht Riversfriend
> Message: 3
> Date: Tue, 9 Mar 2004 05:41:00 -0800 (PST)
> From: Angel Ocasio <d4bidden2000@...>
> Subject: Re: Re: Gargoyle Island in Ocean of Tears
>
> The boats are really slow and awkward to use. You are
> better off swimming.
>
> As far as plat.
...
>
> 6. Farm tradeskill items. Spider silks sell for around
> 20-30pp per stack. Spiderling silks for around the
> same. Animal pelts sell pretty good too. For spider
> silks hunt crag spiders in east karana. Kill
> spiderlings in everfrost or innothule swamp. For pelts
> my favorite place is the karanas and stonebrunt
> mountains.
>
> Hope this helps.
>
